messages.title: Only the Lib Dem's can win here
Conservative support falling, the Lib Dems edge ahead - but it's still too close to call here

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems will balance the books by 2018. Only public services will share in the proceeds of economic growth.
Guarantee education funding from nursery to 19 and qualified teachers in every class.
Cut income tax by an additional £400 by raising the tax-free allowance to £12,500.
Five Green Laws to protect nature and fight climate change.
Invest £8 billion to improve our NHS and guarantee equal care for mental health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can stop the Conservatives here.

issues.economy: Only the Lib Dems have a credible plan to balance the books by 2018.
issues.education: Guarantee education funding from nursery to 19 and qualified teachers in every class.
issues.environment: Five Green Laws to protect nature and fight climate change.
issues.health: Invest £8 billion to improve our NHS and guarantee equal care for mental health.

images.caption: Gerald Vernon-Jackson smiling while holding a campaign flyer.
Bar graphs illustrating the projected votes for political parties in Portsmouth South.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet seems to focus on presenting Gerald Vernon-Jackson as the main competitor to the Conservatives, emphasizing that it's a close race and that Lib Dems are the strategic choice for voters who wish to prevent a Conservative victory.
